text:
e="preserve">Adolfo Gutierrez Quiñones or Adolfo Gordon Quiñones (May 11, 1955 – December 30, 2020), known professionally as Shabba Doo, was an American actor, dancer, and choreographer. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. Quiñones played Orlando "Ozone" in the 1984 breakdancing movie "Breakin'" and its sequel, '.
Quiñones died of a short-illness at his Los Angeles home on December 30, 2020 at the age of 65.
